title: Manager Interview
Application Type: I applied through a recruiter. I interviewed at Alcoholics Anonymous
Interview Descriptions: The process was very slow. Everyone was very nice and available. It started with the hr and continued with the heads. It was focused on my expectations, soft skills and cultural fit. No technical skills were assessed.
Interview Questions: The questions were only soft skills related

title: Head of Business Development Interview
Application Type: The process took 3 weeks. I interviewed at Alcoholics Anonymous in Jan 2022
Interview Descriptions: Simple questions, very structured process. It was pretty easy. In the end I had a chance to ask questions. The initial screening process began with a brief phone call from the HR representative. They asked about my experience, career aspirations, and what attracted me to the company. The representative was knowledgeable, professional, and polite. The call was followed by an email with an invitation to a video conference interview with the hiring manager.
Interview Questions: What is your motivation for applying?

title: Auxiliar Administrativo Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Alcoholics Anonymous (Madrid) in Jan 2022
Interview Descriptions: No me dieron muchos detalles. Fue una entrevista muy rapida y no me cogieron. No me dijeron el sueldo que recibiría pero parecia ser una buena opcion para empezar en el sector social. No tengo claro cual es el proceso de seleccion.

title: Tester Interview
Interview Descriptions: the interview process was easy and good and they asked easy question for the profile. For next round they went to details of project and more technical questions and they kept me waiting for long time
Interview Questions: Tell me about yourself, explain the project in detail

title: Marketing Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Alcoholics Anonymous in Aug 2020
Interview Descriptions: It was a good process, they keep in mind everything while selection of their candidate. The process is very smooth going one with good interviewers. One should be prepared before appearing for the interview.

title: Referee Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Alcoholics Anonymous (Milwaukee, WI) in Apr 2020
Interview Descriptions: Simple and not over the top with unnecessary verbiage. Talk about family history and local upbringing. Discussed the origins of the company and future growth. Mostly of the discussion was educational in nature.

title: Assistant Director of Finance Interview
Application Type: I applied online. I interviewed at Alcoholics Anonymous (New York, NY) in Mar 2017
Interview Descriptions: Very straight forward with no trick questions. One thing I appreciated, and I realize  not everyone may, was that during my visit I met with four different people for approximately one hour each.  Doing the math, that's four plus hours of interviewing. I found it practical and, quite honestly, exciting.

title: Administrative Assistant Interview
Application Type: I interviewed at Alcoholics Anonymous (New York, NY)
Interview Descriptions: I was interviewed and tested for almost 3 hours and I was not offered the position. Why waste so much of someone's time if you have no intention of hiring them?
Interview Questions: How would you handle a situation where a coworker was was rude or insulting to you in front of other coworkers?
